title: "Startraveller Shop Generator"
runtime: shiny
output: html_document

```{r,echo=FALSE}
library(shiny)
source("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/alastair-JL/StarTraveller/master/WeaponsShopHelper.R")

shinyUI(fluidPage(
  titlePanel("StarTraveller Shop")
  ,fluidRow(
   column(1,
      actionButton("goButton", "Go!")
    ),
    column(2,
       numericInput("n", 
        label = "Random Seed",
        value = 652)   
    )
#  ,
#    column(3,
#      sliderInput("priceBounds", "N:", min = 0, max = 25, value = c(0,5),
#                  step = 1)
#    ),    
#    column(3,
#      sliderInput("ShopSize", "Items:", min = 5, max = 150, 25,
#                  step = 1)
#    ),    
#    column(3,
#     selectInput("ShopType",
#    choices = c("General Weapons" = 1, "Guns Shop" = 2, "Blades shop" = 3), 
#    selected = 1, label="Shop Type")
#    )
  )
  ,hr()
  ,fluidRow(column(10,    
      renderDataTable({
             input$goButton
             isolate({
                Filter=list()
                Filter$botPrice<-min(2.5^(input$priceBounds[1]),1500)      
                Filter$topPrice<-max(2.5^(input$priceBounds[2]),300, Filter$botPrice*5)              
                MakeWeaponShop(GeneralWeps,numItems=20,output=FALSE,seed=input$n,Filters=NULL)
            })
      }),
          renderDataTable({
             input$goButton
             isolate({
                Filter=list()
                Filter$botPrice<-min(2.5^(input$priceBounds[1]),1500)      
                Filter$topPrice<-max(2.5^(input$priceBounds[2]),300, Filter$botPrice*5)              
                CoupledGrammerIterationLoop("~~",TrinketGrammer,numItems=20,output=FALSE,seed=input$n,Filters=NULL)
            })
      })
  )) ##NOTE: here is end of fluid row
)#End fluid page
)#End shiny UI

```
